ModMetaData.name: BetterRJW
ModMetaData.author: Eagle of Phantoms, Euclidean
ModMetaData.description:
Load after RimJobWorld
- Adds social impact buff to bigger breasts and penises. - Removes natural and bionic body part debuffs (not hydraulic/peg as they are supposed to be worse). - Makes humpshroom less painful to grow and makes it possible to grow it on the ground and in light.
Thanks to Tory187 and Abraxas for helping me and teaching me stuff.
Continued by Euclidean
